cause.description:
this is a cause (or a club) 4 the St. Joseph School/ Ramallah gurlz where we can meet and chat...i guess
1. to get the kit kats together.
2. hmmmm get to know each other?!
3. oh idk it's just an idea!
cause.mission: to gather all of the students of this skewl together.
cause.name: St. Joseph Skewl
